scripts.buildDevelopmentDatabases: docker build -f data/mysql/Dockerfile .  -t balek-mysqldb:develop && docker build -f data/mongo/Dockerfile .  -t balek-mongo:develop
scripts.startDevelopmentDatabases: docker-compose -f data/mysql/docker-compose.yml up -d && docker-compose -f data/mongo/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.stopDevelopmentDatabases: docker-compose -f data/mysql/docker-compose.yml down && docker-compose -f data/mongo/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.buildAll: npm run preBuild && npm run build && npm run postBuild

scriptsComments.buildDevelopmentDatabases: Uses Docker to build database containers for development
scriptsComments.startDevelopmentDatabases: Uses Docker to run database containers for development
scriptsComments.stopDevelopmentDatabases: Uses Docker to stop database containers for development
scriptsComments.buildDocumentation: Runs the script to build the docs
